data.text: @vulture Her husband was a sleazy bastard, why would anyone be surprised she's friends with other sleazy bastards?
@vulture Hey @NBCNews: An actress friend of mine was recently described as someone who would fit in on a morning show. She can sing and cook and would be fantastic with Hoda...
@vulture @theferocity As a woman, and a mom with a daughter, she is pure trash
